name: Despair And Anger
description: Despair and Anger is a large celestial creature embodying overwhelming sorrow and fierce rage, exhibiting both defensive capabilities and significant mobility.
memorable: Its ability to switch between sorrow and rage forms grants it a unique combat style, dealing both radiant and necrotic damage.
goals: Engaging opponents in combat and leveraging its dual aspects for tactical advantages.
environment: Usually found in locales where battles of emotion and spirit take place.
strengths: High armor class and hit points, along with resistances to necrotic and radiant damage.
weaknesses: Dependence on its dual aspects for optimal performance can be a strategic vulnerability.
attacks: Can unleash devastating melee attacks with Blazing Fists or Shadow Tendrils, and utilize the area attack Burning Rage or the psychic assault Despairing Rejection.
most_powerful_ability: Burning Rage deals significant area damage and allows dexterity saving throws for half damage.
senses: Has truesight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive creatures and objects as they truly are.
skills: Skilled in perception with a +3 bonus, aiding in detecting hidden threats.
additional_information: Immunity to conditions like blinded, charmed, and frightened.
Advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Regains health by dealing necrotic damage while grappling enemies.
Can strategically reposition opponents using Despairing Rejection.
Possesses a powerful bonus action to switch between anger and despair aspects.
test_queries: large celestial creature of sorrow and rage
dual natured monster with radiant damage
monster that can switch forms in battle
celestial that grapples with shadow tendrils
